name: Style Organizer
description:
Text Styles Added!

Merge and link all color & text styles in the page:
- Overall usage assessment
- Group elements with the same appearance together
- Merge and link to selected style
- Select all elements with the style
- Make all possible fix automatically with a single click

Things to notice:

-"Generate Palette" function is removed. Will consider adding it back by popular demand.
- "Auto Fix" function will automatically link all elements with the same appearance to the most used style in the page.
- Please remember to *rescan*  after you modified the file.
- Fills/strokes with image fills are ignored.
- Invisible nodes/ invisibile fill layers are ignored.

Features to do in the next version:

- Create local style for unlinked style
- Performace improvement
- Thumbnail of Angular & radial gradients
- Remote style double check
